## TOnCanvasResized type

Resize listener, event emitted on [IChartComponent.resize()](./core.ichartcomponent.resize.md) call.

```typescript
export declare type TOnCanvasResized = TListener<"onCanvasResized", [canvasDims: ICanvasDimensions]>;
```
